line.words: Cheve Vèt la ak Tigason Envizib la

subtitle.line: The Green Hair and The Invisible Boy
The Green Hair and The Invisible Boy

line.words: Bonjou! Mwen rele Joann. Mwen tris. Mwen tris paske m envizib. Gen yon foto m sou paj sa a, Men, ou pa ka wè m.

subtitle.line: Hello! My name’s Johann. I’m sad. I’m sad because I am invisible. There is a picture of me on that page. But you can’t see me.
Hello! My name’s Johann. I’m sad. I’m sad because I am invisible. There is a picture of me on that page. But you can’t see me.

line.words: Mwen vle pou tout moun ka wè m. Èske tout moun ka wè w? Siman sa bèl.

subtitle.line: I want everybody to be able to see me. Can everyone see you? It must be great.
I want everybody to be able to see me. Can everyone see you? It must be great.

line.words: Mwen vle pou tout moun ka wè pye m lè m ap jwe foutbòl... men m lè m ap ekri... tèt mwen lè m ap pale... janm mwen lè m ap mache epi zèpòl mwen lè m ose yo. Men moun pa kapab wè yo.

subtitle.line: I want everybody to see my foot when I play football… my hand when I write… my head when I talk… my leg when I walk and my shoulders when I shrug. But they can’t.
I want everybody to see my foot when I play football… my hand when I write… my head when I talk… my leg when I walk and my shoulders when I shrug. But they can’t.

line.words: Manman Joann di §Poukisa ou pa al fè rechèch vizibilite, Joann?§ §Sa sa vle di rechèch vizibilite?§ Manman Joann reponn, §Se lè w al chèche yon bagay, yon fason pou tout moun ka wè w.§ §Wi! M pral fè sa.§

subtitle.line: §Why don’t you go on a quest for visibility, Johann?§ Says Johann’s mum. §What is a quest for visibility?§ §It’s when you go on a journey to look for something, a way so that everybody can see you.§ Says Johann’s mum. §Yes! I will.§

§Why don’t you go on a quest for visibility, Johann?§ Says Johann’s mum. §What is a quest for visibility?§ §It’s when you go on a journey to look for something, a way so that everybody can see you.§ Says Johann’s mum. §Yes! I will.§

line.words: §Mwen pral kòmanse rechèch la nan lekòl la§ Sou wout lekòl la, Joann ap chante. §Wouj jòn woz vèt, vyolèt jòn abriko ble, Mwen ka wè yon lakansyèl, men m pa ka wè tèt mwen.§

subtitle.line: §I’ll start my quest at school§ On the way to school, Johann sings a song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me.§
§I’ll start my quest at school§ On the way to school, Johann sings a song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me.§

line.words: Li renmen chante lè l ap mache. Sa ede santi li pi vizib e mwens tris.

subtitle.line: He likes to sing as he walks. It helps to make him feel more visible and less sad.
He likes to sing as he walks. It helps to make him feel more visible and less sad.

line.words: Joann rankontre kondisip lekòl li yo nan lekòl la. Anvan l kòmanse rechèch li a, li deside chèche konnen ak kisa moun sanble.

subtitle.line: Johann meets his classmates at school. He decides that before he goes on his quest, he will find out about the different ways people look.
Johann meets his classmates at school. He decides that before he goes on his quest, he will find out about the different ways people look.

line.words: §Bonjou Jenifè. Ak kisa ou sanble?§ §Bonjou Joann. Mwen gen zye mawon ak cheve mawon.§

subtitle.line: §Hi Jennifer. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and brown hair.§
§Hi Jennifer. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and brown hair.§

line.words: §Bonjou Mavèl. Ak kisa w sanble?§ §Bonjou Johann. Mwen gen zye vèt epi cheve m nwa.’§

subtitle.line: §Hi Marvel. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have green eyes and black hair.§
§Hi Marvel. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have green eyes and black hair.§

line.words: §Bonjou Tòm. Ak kisa w sanble?§ §Bonjou Joann. Mwen gen zye ble epi cheve m wouj.§

subtitle.line: §Hi Tom. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have blue eyes and ginger hair.§
§Hi Tom. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have blue eyes and ginger hair.§

line.words: Anfen li mande Mo. §Bonjou Mo. Ak kisa w sanble?§ §Bonjou Johann. Mwen gen zye mawon epi cheve blon.§ Johann panse, §Tout zanmi m yo gen aparans diferan. Mwen bezwen parèt diferan tou.§

subtitle.line: Finally he asks Mo. §Hi Mo. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and blond hair.§ §My friends all look different§ thinks Johann. §I want to look different too.§
Finally he asks Mo. §Hi Mo. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and blond hair.§ §My friends all look different§ thinks Johann. §I want to look different too.§

line.words: Johann mande pwofesè li a, §Ki kote m pral kòmanse kèt mwen an?§

subtitle.line: §Where shall I start my quest?§ Johann asks his teacher.
§Where shall I start my quest?§ Johann asks his teacher.

line.words: Pwofesè an di l §Ale chèche ansyen bèt nan mòn. Ansyen bèt lan konnen anpil kozman paske li vye anpil.§

subtitle.line: §Go and find the ancient beast of the mountains§ his teacher says. §The ancient beast knows a lot because he is so old.§
§Go and find the ancient beast of the mountains§ his teacher says. §The ancient beast knows a lot because he is so old.§

line.words: Se konsa Joann kòmanse fè rechèch li a. Li mache, li mache, li monte mòn. Pandan l ap mache a, l ap chante chante l la. §Wouj jòn woz vèt, vyolèt jòn abriko ble, Mwen ka wè yon lakansyèl, men m pa ka wè tèt mwen. M poko.§

subtitle.line: And so Johann begins his quest. He walks and he walks, towards the mountains. As he walks he sings his song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me. Yet.§

And so Johann begins his quest. He walks and he walks, towards the mountains. As he walks he sings his song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me. Yet.§

line.words: Pandan l ap mache pou l al nan mò nan, Joann rive bò yon rivyè. Li wè yon gwo pwason ble nan rivyè a. Gwo pwason ble an sote sòti nan dlo a pou l pale ak Joann!

subtitle.line: On the way to the mountains, Johann comes to a river. In the river he sees a big blue fish. The big blue fish jumps out of the water and speaks to Johann!
On the way to the mountains, Johann comes to a river. In the river he sees a big blue fish. The big blue fish jumps out of the water and speaks to Johann!

line.words: Pwason an di l, §Si w vle vye bèt ki ret nan mòn nan ede w, fò ou pote yon kado ba li.§ Epi pwason an disparèt.

subtitle.line: §If you want the ancient beast of the mountains to help you, you must take a present to him§ says the fish, and disappears.
§If you want the ancient beast of the mountains to help you, you must take a present to him§ says the fish, and disappears.

line.words: Joann panse, §Kisa m ta pote pou bèt ki ret nan mòn nan?§ Li chita pou li manje yon zanmann. Nan aprè, yon zwazo koulè zoranj parèt e li kòmanse chante pou Joann. §Ofri l kèk nan zanmann ou yo.§

subtitle.line: §What can I give the ancient beast of the mountains?§ thinks Johann. He sits down and eats an almond. Then an orange bird appears and sings to him. §Offer him some of your almonds.§
§What can I give the ancient beast of the mountains?§ thinks Johann. He sits down and eats an almond. Then an orange bird appears and sings to him. §Offer him some of your almonds.§

line.words: Joann gade zanmann li yo. §Sa a se yon bèl ide! Mèsi zwazo!§ Joann kontinye mache pou l ale jwenn bèt ki ret nan mòn nan.

subtitle.line: Johann looks at his almonds. §A great idea! Thank you bird!§ Johann continues his journey into the mountains.
Johann looks at his almonds. §A great idea! Thank you bird!§ Johann continues his journey into the mountains.

line.words: Joann mache pandan sètèdtan, jiskaske li rive nan mòn (nan tèt mòn nan) kote ansyen bèt mòn nan ap viv lan.

subtitle.line: Johann walks for seven hours, into the mountains (and to the peaks) where the ancient beast of the mountains lives.
Johann walks for seven hours, into the mountains (and to the peaks) where the ancient beast of the mountains lives.

line.words: Li wè vye bèt ki ret nan mòn nan! Li gen yon ke vèt...

subtitle.line: He sees the ancient beast of the mountains! He has a green tail…
He sees the ancient beast of the mountains! He has a green tail…

line.words: Li gen dan fewòs...

subtitle.line: He has ferocious teeth…
He has ferocious teeth…

line.words: Kòn li yo jòn abriko e jòn...

subtitle.line: He has orange and yellow horns…
He has orange and yellow horns…

line.words: Li gen gwo grif...

subtitle.line: He has terrible claws…
He has terrible claws…

line.words: Epi cheve mawon l yo long e yo kouvri tout figi li!

subtitle.line: And he has long brown hair that covers his face!
And he has long brown hair that covers his face!

line.words: Joann di, §Bonjou. Mwen pote kèk zanmann pou ou.§ Li ofri vye bèt ki ret nan mòn nan zanmann. §Mwen vle vini vizib. Èske w ka ede m?§

subtitle.line: §Hello!§ says Johann. §I have some almonds for you.§ He offers the almonds to the ancient beast of the mountains. §I want to be visible. Can you help me?§
§Hello!§ says Johann. §I have some almonds for you.§ He offers the almonds to the ancient beast of the mountains. §I want to be visible. Can you help me?§

line.words: Bèt la jemi, li di, §Mwen rayi zanmann. Men se entansyon an ki konte! M ka ede w. Ou vle vin vizib? M pral ba ou vizibilite. Tout moun ap ka wè w!§

subtitle.line: §I hate almonds!§ roars the ancient beast. §But it is the thought that counts! I can help you. You want to be visible? I will give you visibility. No-one will be able to miss you!§
§I hate almonds!§ roars the ancient beast. §But it is the thought that counts! I can help you. You want to be visible? I will give you visibility. No-one will be able to miss you!§

line.words: §Ale lakay ou. Lè w rive lakay ou, gade tèt ou nan glas.§

subtitle.line: §Go home. When you get there, look in the mirror.§
§Go home. When you get there, look in the mirror.§

line.words: Joann di §Mèsi!§ Epi l pati kite vye bèt ki ret nan mòn nan.

subtitle.line: Johann leaves the ancient beast of the mountains. §Thank you!§ he says.
Johann leaves the ancient beast of the mountains. §Thank you!§ he says.

line.words: Li desann mòn nan.

subtitle.line: He walks back down the mountains.
He walks back down the mountains.

line.words: Li pase bò rivyè a. Li di zwazo jòn abriko a §Mèsi!§ Li di gwo pwason ble a §Mèsi!§

subtitle.line: He walks past the river. §Thank you!§ he says to the orange bird. §Thank you!§ he says to the big blue fish.
He walks past the river. §Thank you!§ he says to the orange bird. §Thank you!§ he says to the big blue fish.

line.words: Finalman, li rive lakay li, l al devan glas la. Li gade nan glas la.

subtitle.line: Finally he arrives home. He goes to the mirror. He looks in the mirror.
Finally he arrives home. He goes to the mirror. He looks in the mirror.

line.words: §Mwen gen cheve vèt! Epi mwen gen kòn! Epi m pot linèt!§ E se te vrèman sa vre. Istwa a fini.

subtitle.line: §I have green hair! And I have horns! And I have glasses!§ And so he did. The end.
§I have green hair! And I have horns! And I have glasses!§ And so he did. The end.
